name: GetBookingList
description:
Retrieve a collection of bookings.

Use this tool to get a collection of bookings from the Squareup service. Relevant permissions (OAuth scope) are needed: `APPOINTMENTS_READ` for buyer-level and `APPOINTMENTS_ALL_READ` along with `APPOINTMENTS_READ` for seller-level permissions.

parameters.name: results_per_page_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to display per page in the response. Accepts an integer value.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results per page to return in a paged response.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: The pagination cursor from the previous response for fetching the next page of results. Leave unset for the first page.

value_schema.description: The pagination cursor from the preceding response to return the next page of the results. Do not set this when retrieving the first page of the results.

parameters.name: specific_customer_id
parameters.description: The specific customer for whom to retrieve bookings. If not set, retrieves bookings for all customers.

value_schema.description: The [customer](entity:Customer) for whom to retrieve bookings. If this is not set, bookings for all customers are retrieved.

parameters.name: team_member_id
parameters.description: Specify the team member ID to retrieve bookings for. If not set, retrieves bookings for all team members.

value_schema.description: The team member for whom to retrieve bookings. If this is not set, bookings of all members are retrieved.

parameters.name: specific_location_id
parameters.description: Specify the location ID to retrieve bookings for that location only. If not set, bookings for all locations are retrieved.

value_schema.description: The location for which to retrieve bookings. If this is not set, all locations' bookings are retrieved.

parameters.name: earliest_start_time
parameters.description: The RFC 3339 timestamp for the earliest booking start time. Defaults to current time if not set.

value_schema.description: The RFC 3339 timestamp specifying the earliest of the start time. If this is not set, the current time is used.

parameters.name: latest_start_time
parameters.description: The RFC 3339 timestamp for the latest acceptable start time of bookings. Defaults to 31 days after `start_at_min` if not set.

value_schema.description: The RFC 3339 timestamp specifying the latest of the start time. If this is not set, the time of 31 days after `start_at_min` is used.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results per page to return in a paged response.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results per page to return in a paged response.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The pagination cursor from the preceding response to return the next page of the results. Do not set this when retrieving the first page of the results.

value_schema.description: The pagination cursor from the preceding response to return the next page of the results. Do not set this when retrieving the first page of the results.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The [customer](entity:Customer) for whom to retrieve bookings. If this is not set, bookings for all customers are retrieved.

value_schema.description: The [customer](entity:Customer) for whom to retrieve bookings. If this is not set, bookings for all customers are retrieved.

parameters.name: team_member_id
parameters.description: The team member for whom to retrieve bookings. If this is not set, bookings of all members are retrieved.

value_schema.description: The team member for whom to retrieve bookings. If this is not set, bookings of all members are retrieved.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: The location for which to retrieve bookings. If this is not set, all locations' bookings are retrieved.

value_schema.description: The location for which to retrieve bookings. If this is not set, all locations' bookings are retrieved.

parameters.name: start_at_min
parameters.description: The RFC 3339 timestamp specifying the earliest of the start time. If this is not set, the current time is used.

value_schema.description: The RFC 3339 timestamp specifying the earliest of the start time. If this is not set, the current time is used.

parameters.name: start_at_max
parameters.description: The RFC 3339 timestamp specifying the latest of the start time. If this is not set, the time of 31 days after `start_at_min` is used.

value_schema.description: The RFC 3339 timestamp specifying the latest of the start time. If this is not set, the time of 31 days after `start_at_min` is used.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
